description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The REF_PROV_SEC_ID table holds secondary (legacy) identifiers for the referring provider.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: REF_PROV_SEC_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a qualifier describing additional IDs used to identify the referring provider.

columns.name: REF_PROV_SEC_ID
columns.description: This item holds additional IDs for the referring provider.
